meanings.definition: A person who believes in or advocates for anarchism.
meanings.sent1: Some anarchists prefer peaceful protests to express their beliefs.
meanings.sent2: The anarchists gathered in the park to discuss their ideas.
meanings.sent3: The anarchists decided to have a potluck to promote their cause.
meanings.sent4: In the world of ideas, anarchists are like wildflowers, spreading their thoughts freely.
meanings.sent5: The image of anarchists wearing colorful masks became a symbol of rebellion.

meanings.definition: A member of a political movement that aims to overthrow established systems of government.
meanings.sent1: The anarchists planned a rally to demand change in the government.
meanings.sent2: Some anarchists believe in using force to achieve their goals.
meanings.sent3: The anarchists joked about having a dance-off with the government officials.
meanings.sent4: In the battle of ideologies, anarchists are the storm that shakes the foundations of power.
meanings.sent5: The anarchists' call for revolution echoed through the streets, stirring up the masses.
